contentList.content: Made from the fur of a legendary predator, this mantle bestows the wearer with the instincts of a hunter. Each attack against a wounded foe fuels their rage, turning every battle into a relentless pursuit.

Crafted from the sinew and leather of swift predators, these boots grant the wearer unparalleled speed. Each critical strike or kill restores their movement, allowing them to dart across the battlefield with lethal agility.
When the wearer inflicts a condition upon a hostile creature, they also gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag>.
This amulet, carved from the tooth of a rampaging beast, channels the wearer's fury into their attacks.
When you deal critical damage, gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag>.

This helm, crafted form the skull of a mighty beast, enhances the wearer's ferocity. It fills the mind with an unquenchable thirst for battle, reducing the threshold for critical strikes and amplifying their intimidating presence.
The number you need to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [1]. If you have the Brutal Critical feature, it is instead reduced by [2]. This effect can stack.
You add your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

These gauntlets, infused with the essence of primal fury, reduce the threshold for powerful strikes. When the wearer's wrath reaches its peak, they gain an extra burst of power, embodying the frenzied spirit of a berserker.
If you have [1] or more turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag>, gain a Bonus Action.
These furs, taken from the hide of an ancient titan, offer unparalleled strength.
Enemies within [1] become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to [2], unless they are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to it.
Forged in the fires of endless conflict, this ring enhances the wearer's strength and ferocity.
If you have [1] or more turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag>, gain an Action.
Forged in a volcanic fury, this greataxe is the embodiment of relentless rage. It returns to its master when thrown, seeking out blood with an unerring path.
When landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, deal additional damage equal to your bonus to your Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
This mantle, crafted from the pelts of apex predators, instills the wearer with relentless stamina. Each enemy slain revitalizes their spirit, fueling their primal rage and endurance.
When you kill an enemy, restore [1] Hit Points.
Woven from the fibers of sacred plants, this cloth provides unmatched durability. It bolsters the wearer's vitality, allowing them to withstand the harshest conditions and fiercest battles.
Your maximum Hit Points increases by [1].
This pendant, fashioned from the fangs of ancient predators, sharpens the wearer's reflexes. It enhances their dexterity and grants the nimbleness of a cat, making them quick and elusive in combat.

Carved from the heartwood of an ancient tree and imbued with primal fury, this greaclub is a bane to unnatural creatures. Its swing reverberate with the raw power of the wild, crushing abominations with every blow.

These gauntlets, forged from the claws of great beasts, grant the wearer the agility and predatory instincts of the wild. Each strike rends flesh with savage precision, leaving gaping wounds in their wake.
When you deal damage to a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> target, inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUND">Gaping Wounds</LSTag> for [1] turn.
You add your Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for Survival <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Adorned with feathers and bones of revered beasts, this headdress enhances the wearer's fortitude, granting them the resilience and strength of a bear. It embodies the spirit of the untamed wilderness.
Forged in the depths of the wild, this ring hardens the wearer's skin like the toughest hide. It provides exceptional protection, reducing damage from all sources and bolstering their constitution.
As long as you are not wearing armour or holding a shield, reduce all incoming damage by [1].

Crafted from the hides of swift creatures, these legendary boots grant unparalleled speed and agility. They allow the wearer to move with the grace of a hunting cat, striking quickly and retreating just as fast.
Your maximum Hit Points increases by [1] times your bonus to Survival <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
A sleek hand crossbow that whispers melodies of deceit. Its bolts, infused with psychic energy, strike with the precision and grace of a bard's plucked string.
These gloves, supple and light, empower the hands that wear them, turning every touch into an act of art, from the nimble pluck of a lute string to the subtle sleight of hand.
Soft as a shadow, thes boots carry the wearer with the silence of a soft serenade, making each step an echo of a dance heard only by the stars.
A cloak woven from the fabric of the astral plane, enhancing the wearer's will with the strength of an ancient chorus. It cloaks their movements in the shadows of forgotten melodies.
You add your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Crafted from velvet as dark as a moonless night, this vest turns each gesture into a performance, its threads vibrating with the charisma of a master performer.
You add your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for Sleight Of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
This crown, adorned with harmonic crystals, enhance the wearer's intellect. Thoughts flow like music, clear and sharp, orchestrating strategies with ease.

You add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to all your Intelligence-based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>. This stacks with regular <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> and Expertise.
A repository of knowledge, this amulet holds the wisdom of countless tales. It grants the wearer the clarity of a sage, turning their speech into spells that captivate and command.
Advantage on all Intelligence-based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.
Legendary and radiant, this ring sets the charisma of its bearer to match the allure of the siren's call, weaving magic and charm into an irresistible smyphony of influence.

Woven from enchanted silk, this cloak allows the wearer to disengage from foes with the ease of a dancer. It grants the agility to slip away from danger, setting the stage for the next graceful strike.
Light and flexible, this armor provides protection without sacrifice mobility. Each missed attack against the wearer is an opportunity, granting momentum to outmaneuver opponents.
When a melee attack misses you, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Crafted from the finest leather, these boots grant the wearer exceptional speed and agility. They allow for quick retreats, restoring momentum with every tactical withdrawal.
This stylish cap is more than just a fashionable accessory; it enhances the wearer's poise, making every movement and word resonate with confidence and flair.
When you hit a target with a melee attack, you inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag>.
This locket holds a piece of the duellist's soul, enhancing their reflexes and granting an additional reaction in the heat of battle. It is a symbol of their unwavering focus and readiness.
These glvoes are crafted for the art of duelling, enhancing the wearer's precision and defense.
While only holding one weapon in your main hand and nothing in your free hand, gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

Adorned with intricate designs, this ring enhances the wearer's dexterity and ability to find openings in their opponent's defenses. Each missed attack is an invitation to strike back with increased power.
When a melee attack misses you, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TI_EMPOWERMENT">Empowerment</LSTag> for [1] turn.

Forged by the finest swordsmiths and enchanted by the greatest bards, Bladesong sings through the air with every strike. Its wielder moves with unmatched grace, turning missed strikes into opportunities for swift retribution.
A vibrant cloak that flows dramatically, catching the eye and heart, encouraging allies with its display of valor.
Soft leather gloves that allow for intricate hand movements, enhancing the wearer's instrumental play and dexterity in combat.
When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, they also gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEROISM">Heroism</LSTag>.
A ring engraved with a crest, it solidifies the presence of the wearer.
Crafted from polished silver and inlaid with sapphire notes, this circlet enhances the wearer's natural charisma and sharpens their performance, resonating with their powers

When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, they also gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag>.
Rugged, yet comfortable, these boots carry the wearer across many lands. They bear sigils of swiftness and pusle with an energy that drives the wearer's allies forward into adventure.
When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, they also gain a free use of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag>.
You gain a use of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> using a bonus action.
A rapier with a blade that gleams like the first light of dawn. Runes etched along its length resonate with the power of ancient epics, and it hums a harmonious tune when wielded in combat.
Grant allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all their attacks for [1] turns on a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Performance Check</LSTag>.
This shield bears the images of legendary battles and acts of valor. It seems almost alive, its surface shimmering with a protective light.
If you have <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, you gain [1] more use of it.
Aegis of Heroic Verse: Bardic Inspiration Depleted
The Bardic Inspiration charge granted from this shield is depleted. A <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will restore it.
A delicate amulet containing a fragment of a hero's relic, it vibrates with the strength of legends past, infusing the wearer's words with the power to move allies to heroic action.
When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration_Combat">Combat Inspiration</LSTag>, they also gain an additional bonus action for [1] turn.
This ornate breastplate is a masterwork of craftsmanship, adorned with motifs symbolizing great deeds. It radiates an inspiring aura that emboldens those who fight alongside the bard.
When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration_Combat">Combat Inspiration</LSTag>, they also gain a lethargy-less haste for [1] turn.
Emitting an aura that inspires Strength of the wearer's allies. They gain +[1] to their Strength Ability Score.
Near an aura of strength. Gains +[1] to their Strength Ability Score.
Woven from the silken threads of an archon's wings, this mantle offers gentle protection. It wraps its wearer in a soothing embrace, warding off harm and restoring vitality with each touch.

Crafted for the tireless healer, these sandals enhance the wearer's speed and agility. They ensure that no matter how dire the battle, the healer can always reach those in need with swift and sure steps.
When the wearer heals a creature, the wearer's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is restored to maximum.

A ring that glows with a gentle radiance, it enhances the wearer's ability to mend wounds. Each healing spell cast with this ring is imbued with additional potency, ensuring swift and effective recovery.

Forged in the light of dawn, this shield stands as a bulwark against the forces of darkness. It reflects the steadfast resolve of its bearer, turning aside blows with divine grace and retaliating with righteous force.
These gloves, imbued with sacred power, strengthen the wearer's healing touch. Each gesture brings comfort and restoration, filling the wounded with newfound strength and vigor.
When the wearer heals a creature, they gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TI_AMPLIFICATION">Amplification</LSTag>.
This medallion, hanging close to the heart, channels the wearer's inner light. It amplifies their healing spells, turning each incantation into a potent force of recovery and rejuvenation.
When you heal another creature, you restore an additional amount equal to your Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
This halo, crafted from celestial light, bestows upon its wearer the wisdom of the ages. It enhances their healing abilities, allowing them to channel divine energy with clarity and purpose.

When the wearer heals a creature, they gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZEAL">Zeal</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TI_EMPOWERMENT">Empowerment</LSTag>.

This armor, forged from blessed metals, fortifies the wearer's spirit as well as their body. It emanates a serene aura, turning critical blows into mere glances and bolstering allies with divine protections.

When the wearer heals a creature, they gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TI_MAGIC_WARD">Magic Ward</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Bless</LSTag>.
This legendary mace is imbued with the essence of life itself. Each strike delivers not only a powerful blow but also a wave of restorative energy, rejuvenating allies and soothing wounds.

When you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PreserveLife">Preserve Life</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HealingRadiance_Heal">Healing Radiance</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Heal">Heal</LSTag>, restore all movement, action and bonus actions of affected targets.

This mantle, woven from sun-kissed fibers, envelops the wearer in a shroud of radiance. It protects against darkness, making foes who dare to strike regret their actions as they are scorched by radiant orbs.
A creature that damages the wearer within [1] receives <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag>
Forged from the molten core of a volcano, this breastplate emits a radiant shockwave with every strike. It embodies the fierce and unyielding power of the sun, burning all who came too close.
When the wearer deals [1], they cause a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Explosion">Radiant Shockwave</LSTag>.
These gloves are imbued with the essence of the sun's celestial arsenal. They empower the wearer's melee attacks with the searing heat of a thousand suns, turning every strike into a blazing inferno.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with longswords, pikes and warhammers. In addition, your melee weapon attacks deal [1].
Hanging from a golden chain, this amulet pulses with the heat of the sun. It intensifies the wearer's radiant damage, marking foes with burning orbs that sear their very soul.
When the wearer deals [1], inflict [2] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> upon the target.
When the wearer deals [1], inflict [2] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> upon the target.
Set with a radiant gem, this ring channels the dual fury of fire and light. It enhances the wearer's spells, inflicting additional damage and marking enemies with the sun's burning wrath.
When the wearer is illuminated by a light source, they have a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>.
When dealing [1], the wearer deals an additional [2].

Forged in the heart of a dwarven forge, this warhammer glows with the first light of dawn. It channels the sun's fiery energy, burning foes with searing heat and illuminating the path of righteousness.
When the wearer is illuminated by a light source, the wearer's fire spells deal additional damage equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
When the wearer is illuminated by a light source, the wearer's radiant spells deal additional damage equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

This shield shines with the brilliance of the morning sun, deflecting attacks with radiant force. It blazes with solar power providing both protection and the ability to retaliate with celestial fury.

Crafted from the leather of a mythical beast from the plane of elemental fire, these boots grant the wearer the wisdom and agility of the sun's light. Each step reasonates with the sun's radiant power, guiding the wearer with unparalleled clarity.
Crafted from the purest sunstone, this circlet radiates wisdom and power. It amplifies the wearer's spellcasting abilities, filling their mind with the enlighenment of the sun's eternal light.

When the wearer deals [1] through a spell, inflict a number of d6 of [2] equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> for each status of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> the target has.
This helm, crafted from storm-forged metal, shields the mind from blinding lights and illusions. It pulses with a calm certainty, like the eye of a storm, granting clarity amidst chaos.
These gloves thrum with the static charge of a lightning strike, enhancing the wearer's touch with the shocking grasp of a bolt from the blue.
This ring holds a miniature tempest, swirling under its surface. When spells are cast, it vibrates with energy, enhancing magical effects with the resonance of thunder.
Whenever you deal spell damage, inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION ">Reverberation</LSTag> upon the target.
Each plate of this armor is etched with sigils of thunder and lightning, offering a bastion against the roar of storms. It hums softly with the threat of thunder, ready to unleash its fury.
Whenever a creature deals melee damage to the wearer, that creature takes [1] and gains [2] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION ">Reverberation</LSTag>.
When a melee attack misses you, the attacker is knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Made from the hide of a creature struck by lightning, these boots crackle softly with residual energy, granting the wearer stability as if the ground beneath them is the eye of the storm.
The wearer cannot be pushed or get knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Cloaking in swirling winds, this garment crackles with the power of a thousand storms. It lashes out with thunderous vengeance at any who dare strike its wearer, echoing the untamed spirit of the tempest.
Hanging from this chain is a gem that flickers like lightning. It captures the essence of storm winds, enhancing the wearer's movements with the speed and unpredictability of a gale.
When the wearer deals [1], [2] or [3], inflict [4] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag> upon the target.
Forged in the heart of a hurricane, this maul resonates with the low rumble of distant thunder. Each swing unleashes a tempest's fury, echoing the chaos of the storm it was born from.

When the wearer deals [1], inflict a number of d6 of [2] equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> for each status of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION ">Reverberation</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag> that the target has.
Crafted from the leaves of eternal autumn, this cloak shields the wearer from harm with thorns that retaliate against any who dare strike, drawing blood to nourish its verdant magic.
Whenever a creature deals melee damage to the wearer, that creature takes [1] and receives <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>.
Made from the bark of the ironwood tree, these boots root the wearer firmly to the ground, granting freedom from the entanglements of both flora and foes alike.
Hanging from a cord of braided vines, this amulet sharpens the wearer's connections to the blade's edge, guiding it to strike with the precision and ruthlessness of nature's own fury.
When one of your spells deals [1] or [2], deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
These gloves are stithced from the hide of a great beast, and veins of sap run through their seams. Each touch can rend the earth, sowing seeds of destruction in slashes and stabs.
Whenever you deal [1] or [2], the target needs to succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>.
Whenever you deal [1] or [2], the target needs to succeed a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED_VINES">Entangled</LSTag>.
Set with a moss agate that drips with dew, this ring exudes a potent toxin, infusing each poison with the relentless force of nature's wrath, seeping into wounds to debilitate and dominate.
When you deal [1] to a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> target, inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> for [2] turns.
This crown, woven from the living vines of the oldest grove, grants the wearer the wisdom of the eart. Thoughts deepen, rooted in the timeless knowledge of the natural world.

Whenever you deal [1] to a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> target, your target needs to succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag>.
This vest, embroidered with the patterns of wild growth, channels the protective spirits of the forest, imbuing the wearer with a sage's insight and an earthwarden's resilience.

Emitting a protective aura. All allies <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> can't be reduced by Difficult Terrain, spells or magical effects. They can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> or forcibly moved. They are immune to surface conditions.

A legendary staff that pulses with the life force of the forest. Its touch revitalizes the soil, and its swings call forth the might of ancient trees, bending nature to the will of its wielder.
Imbue yourself with natural energy sourced from each season.

Embrace the wildfires of summer to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage. In addition, your fire spells deal additional Fire damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict [1] turn of Burning.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.

Embrace the slicing winds of spring to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing damage. In addition, your slashing spells deal additional Slashing damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict [1] turn of Bleeding.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict [1] turn of Poison.

This slender staff is topped with a shimmering moonstone that ebbs and flows with light. It channels the ebb of tides and the chill of the moon, granting the wielder control over water and ice.
Crafted from supple leather, these boots carry the wearer with the silence of a nocturnal predator, enhancing jumps with the weightlesness of a moonlit leap.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance is increased by [1] while using your druidic Wild Shape ability.
This simple band is inlaid with a luminescent material that glows like faerie fire.
Woven from threads that glisten like moonbeams, this cloak can envelop the wearer in a mist, granting them swift movement and the mystery of the moon's veiled light.
Gain [1] of Movement Speed. This effect persists while using your druidic wild shape ability.
These gloves are cool to the touch and patterned with crescents. These gloves imbue the wearer's strikes with the clarity of moonlight, sharpening attacks and bolstering defenses.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold and Radiant damage. This effect persists while using your druidic wild shape.
Deal an additional [1] to Attack Rolls and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while using your druidic wild shape.
Wrought from silver and set with a dark sapphire that reflects the night sky, this diadem enhances the wearer's wisdom and grants them the ability to see clearly in the darkness of the new moon.

Gain a +[1] bonus to initiative rolls and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. This effect persists while using your druidic wild shape.
You can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [1]. This effect persists while using your druidic wild shape.
Containing a fragment of meteorite, this amulates pulsates with a strong, primal energy, granting the wearer formidable power and resilience when transformed, as unstoppable as the celestial tide.
Gain the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TI_WILDSHAPE_LUNAR_MIGHT">Lunar Might</LSTag> when in druidic wild shape.

Size is increased, weapon attacks deal an additional [1] damage, the affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and gain +[2] to your Strength and Constitution score. <LSTag Tooltip="CarryWeight">Carrying capacity</LSTag> is also increased by 25%.
This garment glows with a soft luminescence and is etched with phases of the moon. It provides potent protection and strengthens the wearer's connection to the guardian spirit of the lunar cycle.

Finally, you also have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells. This effect persists while using your druidic wild shape.
